title: Manhunt Underway In Pennsylvania For "Extremely Dangerous" Suspect
teaser: Authorities are searching for Eric Frein, who is suspected of shooting two police officers in the Pocono Mountains on Friday night.
contentencoded:
Two school districts are closed today in northeast Pennsylvania as authorities undertake a manhunt for suspect state police say is “heavily armed” and “extremely dangerous.”

Eric Frein, 31, is suspected of shooting two police officers in the Pocono Mountains on Friday night, outside a remote police barracks. One of the officers died.

Pennsylvania State Police are calling Frein a survivalist, and warning the public that he is armed, dangerous, and harbors a vendetta against law enforcement. They have also said they currently don’t know his whereabouts.

Here & Now’s Robin Young gets an update on the situation from Associated Press reporter Michael Rubinkam.

Guest

  • Michael Rubinkam, reporter for the Associated Press. He tweets @michaelrubinkam.
